info.name: Events API
info.description:
API collection for managing events. This collection contains endpoints for creating and managing events in the application.

## Base URL
`{{baseUrl}}/api/events`

## Authentication
No authentication required for these endpoints.

## Event Model
Events contain the following fields:
- **title** (required): Event title
- **description** (required): Event description
- **overview** (required): Event overview
- **image** (required): Event image URL
- **venue** (required): Event venue name
- **location** (required): Event location
- **date** (required): Event date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- **time** (required): Event time in HH:MM format (24-hour)
- **mode** (required): Event mode (e.g., online, offline, hybrid)
- **audience** (required): Target audience
- **agenda** (required): Array of agenda items
- **organizer** (required): Event organizer name
- **tags** (required): Array of tags

formdata.description: Event time in HH:MM format - 24 hour (required)
Event mode: online, offline, or hybrid (required)

request.description:
Create a new event.

**Content-Type**: multipart/form-data

**Request Body Fields:**
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | string | Yes | Event title |
| description | string | Yes | Event description |
| overview | string | Yes | Event overview |
| image | string | Yes | Event image URL |
| venue | string | Yes | Event venue name |
| location | string | Yes | Event location |
| date | string | Yes | Date in YYYY-MM-DD format |
| time | string | Yes | Time in HH:MM format (24-hour) |
| mode | string | Yes | Event mode (online/offline/hybrid) |
| audience | string | Yes | Target audience |
| agenda | string[] | Yes | Array of agenda items (at least one) |
| organizer | string | Yes | Event organizer name |
| tags | string[] | Yes | Array of tags (at least one) |

**Response Codes:**
- `201 Created`: Event created successfully
- `400 Bad Request`: Invalid JSON format
- `500 Internal Server Error`: Event creation failed

**Success Response Example:**
```json
{
  "message": "Events create successfully",
  "event": {
    "_id": "...",
    "title": "Tech Conference 2025",
    "slug": "tech-conference-2025",
    "description": "...",
    "createdAt": "...",
    "updatedAt": "..."
  }
}
```

**Error Response Example:**
```json
{
  "message": "Event creation failed",
  "error": "Error message"
}
```
